WorkItem.ClosedComment: User misconception, and the default templates are fine
WorkItem.Description: I've selected a couple of uncommon gem templates for my Elemental Shaman, but I am getting results with Rare red gems socketed.

Comments.Message: Did you disable the rare/epic gemming templates?
Looks like it's assuming that, because I have rare reds in some of the gear that I've got, it can put rare reds in the other slots, too....

Well... Yeah...? Can't tell if you're talking about items being available to the optimizer (unmark them if you don't want them to be used by the optimizer), or if you're talking about gemming templates (disable the gemming templates).
Could someone have a look at the gemming templates? I never really got into them or how they work.
